mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.`name`, t.pid, t.resource_type, t.url, t.icon, t.sort, t.target FROM sens_rbac_permission t, sens_rbac_role_permission_ref r WHERE r.role_id = #{value} AND t.id = r.permission_id ORDER BY t.sort ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.`name`, p.pid, p.resource_type, p.url, p.icon, p.sort, p.target FROM sens_user u, sens_rbac_role r, sens_rbac_user_role_ref ur, sens_rbac_permission p, sens_rbac_role_permission_ref rp WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND ur.user_id = u.id AND ur.role_id = r.id AND rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.role_id = r.id ORDER BY p.sort ASC

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.`name`, p.pid, p.resource_type, p.url, p.icon, p.sort, p.target FROM sens_user u, sens_rbac_role r, sens_rbac_user_role_ref ur, sens_rbac_permission p, sens_rbac_role_permission_ref rp WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND ur.user_id = u.id AND ur.role_id = r.id AND rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.role_id = r.id AND p.resource_type = #{resourceType} ORDER BY p.sort ASC
